P

Photo - Class in com.team08storyapp
Photo is a model class representing an image or illustration that can be used in an Annotation on a Story Fragment in a Story or as an illustration on a Story Fragment in a Story.
Photo() - Constructor for class com.team08storyapp.Photo
The default constructor for creating an Photo object.
PhotoController - Class in com.team08storyapp
PhotoController is a controller class that is responsible for resizing (if needed), saving illustrations and update the current story and current story fragment.
PhotoController(Activity, Context, Story, StoryFragment, int, FileHelper) - Constructor for class com.team08storyapp.PhotoController
Constructor of the PhotoController takes in all the variables it needs and set them to corresponding variables to its own fields.
PicAdapter - Class in com.team08storyapp
PicAdapter is a customized Adapter based on BaseAdapter
PicAdapter(Context, ArrayList<Photo>, int, int) - Constructor for class com.team08storyapp.PicAdapter
This constructor of PicAdapter will populate all images from photoList into a gallery with customized getView function.
position - Variable in class com.team08storyapp.OfflineStoriesActivity
 
position - Variable in class com.team08storyapp.OnlineStoriesActivity
